name: Hapunan
storyline:
You play as Niko, a hardworking balut vendor who gets caught in a dangerous situation.

What starts as a simple task to get a business permit turns into something much bigger. As you investigate, you discover a dark secret involving the Barangay Captain, his dangerous friends, and a violent past. Along the way, you’ll face tough decisions, uncover hidden truths, and fight to protect your family.
